Merry Christmas from Books2Door! However you’re celebrating, ‘tis the season to curl up with a great book and lose yourself in its world. From festive favourites to a round of this year’s bestsellers, beautiful gift sets to great value collections. We’ve got a little something for everyone in our Christmas selection.

Make sure you check out these remarkable advent calendars guaranteed to put a smile on every child’s face. Perfect for counting down the days to Christmas, each day brings a new hand-sized book to enjoy, featuring some of your favourite characters. The best news? We’re selling them at up to 40% off RRP, so it’s a great deal for the Xmas season!

If you’re looking for some great presents, we’ve gathered together our bestselling Gifts for Under £10 and Gifts for Under £20. In these collections, you’ll find a range of wonderful reads locked in at our best possible prices. They’re perfect if you’re shopping on a budget but still want the highest quality brand new books you can find. Don’t miss out on our stocking fillers either - the perfect selection for Father Christmas’s sleigh!

We’re bringing in some great new books just in time for Christmas that you and your family will love for this season’s readings. We’ve got treasuries of Julia Donaldson and Axel Scheffler’s best-loved picture books, which would make perfect gifts. For fantasy fans, we have excellent five-book starter sets for Robert Jordan’s The Wheel of Time and Terry Pratchett’s Discworld. And of course, what’s Christmas without a 2022 Annual under the tree? We’re adding new books to our website all the time, so keep this collection bookmarked - you never know what we’ll be stocking next!

Christmas is a time where you look back and remember times past. It’s the perfect season to crack open some classic children’s books. We’ve got favourites from Black Beauty to A Christmas Carol, with many available as instant collection boxed sets. Classics are also a fixture of many of our reading libraries. These well-loved stories have been revised in order to suit a reading scheme that will bring your child from phonics to independent reading. There are also some great board book libraries for younger readers, so every member of the family can have their own.

After everyone has tucked into Christmas dinner, there’s nothing for it but a Netflix binge to relax. But we’ve got an even better idea! We’ve gathered together the books behind the hit shows so that you can get ahead on Bridgerton and The Witcher. However, if your mind’s on your next meal instead, take a look at our selection of cookbooks. It features many of the world’s cuisines, and there’s a book for every skill level. Bounce into the new year with a new set of recipes to try - you may encounter some new favourites.

We love the festive season here at Books2Door. However, we also know it can be an expensive time of year. That’s why we try our hardest to bring you book sets at the best possible prices, so no one misses out on a book this Christmas. We wish you a peaceful holiday season, and happy reading!
